selections.name: Fighting Magnus
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 2nd at this track and distance last start on similar going. Drawn perfectly to get a soft run.

selections.name: So You Ready
selections.reason: Comes out of a strong Provincial Class 1 at Gosford where he finished 4th. That form is superior to this grade.

selections.name: Charmed Destiny
selections.reason: Drops in grade from recent efforts. 5th in a BM58 last start suggests he is competitive here.

selections.name: Miss Defy
selections.reason: Has been racing in tougher company. 6th at Gunnedah last start was respectable.

danger_horse.name: So You Ready
danger_horse.reason: Provincial form lines make him a serious threat to the top selection.

selections.name: Aeternum
selections.reason: Standout form reference with a 3rd at Gosford and 5th at Beaumont. This is a significant drop in class to a Country Maiden.

selections.name: Jade Trees
selections.reason: Ex-Victorian galloper now with Brett Dodson. Placed at Warrnambool on debut which is strong form for this.

selections.name: Speedy Pete
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid 2nd at Tuncurry. Will strip fitter and be in the finish.

selections.name: Whiskers
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd at this track last start. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Jade Trees
danger_horse.reason: Unknown quantity locally but brings solid Victorian form lines.

selections.name: Kid Billy
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with a 2nd at Port Macquarie and 4th at Coffs Harbour. Consistent type who deserves a win.

selections.name: Repeat Offender
selections.reason: Showed improvement to finish 4th at this track last start. Drawn well to settle closer.

selections.name: Argerich
selections.reason: Ran on well for 4th at Port Macquarie last time. The step up in trip should suit.

selections.name: Finding Elle
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Ballina last start. Has place claims in this field.

danger_horse.name: Repeat Offender
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced and improving with each run.

selections.name: Rubinsky
selections.reason: Racing in excellent form with back-to-back 2nd placings at Armidale and Kempsey. Drawn to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Smashing Nova
selections.reason: Very consistent with two 2nd placings at this track recently. Must be included.

selections.name: Parfumier
selections.reason: Resuming. Placed at Gosford and Newcastle last preparation. That form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Kirkall
selections.reason: Kris Lees trainee who finished 5th at Muswellbrook. Improvement expected.

danger_horse.name: Parfumier
danger_horse.reason: If ready to go first-up, her Provincial form makes her the one to beat.

selections.name: Fast Blue
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade from Provincial company. 5th at Beaumont and 7th at Wyong reads very well for a Country Class 1.

selections.name: Fools Play
selections.reason: Consistent mare who rarely runs a bad race. 3rd at Lismore and 5th at Armidale keep her in the mix.

selections.name: King Soleil
selections.reason: Finished 4th at this track last start. Has ability and can feature.

selections.name: Prince Of Prophets
selections.reason: Resuming. Won his maiden well before the break. Watch betting.

danger_horse.name: Fools Play
danger_horse.reason: Drawn the rails and has the consistency to upset.

selections.name: Life Coach
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Drops from a Gosford BM64 where he finished 6th. This is a massive drop in grade.

selections.name: Get Some Fun
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track in BM66 grade. In winning form and must be respected.

selections.name: Cardsharp
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at Coffs Harbour last start. Has a good record at this distance range.

selections.name: Savvyrocker
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Get Some Fun two starts back. Meets him better at the weights.

danger_horse.name: Get Some Fun
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock and he loves this track.

selections.name: Amalfi Amore
selections.reason: Last start winner at Tuncurry on wet ground. Conditions suit and he stays in a winnable grade.

selections.name: Never Island
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at Coffs Harbour last start. Consistent mare who handles the soft.

selections.name: Strobing
selections.reason: Honest campaigner who finished 3rd at Coffs Harbour. Will be running on.

selections.name: Phoenix Power
selections.reason: 4th at Port Macquarie last start. Drawn well and can figure.

danger_horse.name: Never Island
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and maps to get a good run.

selections.name: Difensivo
selections.reason: Broke his maiden impressively at Muswellbrook last start. Looks a progressive type who can handle the step up.

selections.name: Sapphire Kiss
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance last start. Loves Taree and handles the conditions.

selections.name: Brazen Brando
selections.reason: Won at Tuncurry last start. Veteran who knows how to win.

selections.name: Bethsheba
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at Port Macquarie last start. Has speed and can give a sight.

danger_horse.name: Sapphire Kiss
danger_horse.reason: Track specialist who is hard to beat on her home deck.
